page.title: 19SUPERNATURAL
page.content: In Lapford these are two popular{ghost {stories.}One is about the Grange.It goes that once a mad rector lived there,he one day pushed a maid in the pond and she drowned,but where her hand scrapped the bank,grass is said never to have grown again.Also there is this one it is connected with the church.Our church is one built by { {Hugh de Tracy}who was one of the soldiers to kill {Thomas Becket.}The stories vary but this is the one that most people know.On the 27th of December in the evening his ghost rides by on a horse.He goes past the church and then on up the village.
